column5: Newly remodeled and refurnished Condo with an amazing Ocean View from balcony.  2 bedroom with sleeping for 8. Great amenities: Playground, 2 pools, basketball, tennis and more.  This is a 2nd floor condo with two flights of stairs but the view is worth it!  Children 12 and under are not counted towards the maximum occupancy. City Permit #248230
column8: Ocean View Condo with boardwalk, pool, playgrounds
